column2: # pull in some WDI metadata which will be used for constructing AKI indicators.
# WDI metadata was gathered using previous vintages of WDI from 2016-19
# Metadata was gathered and saved as csv files in the 011_data folder

New names:
* `Country Code` -> Country.Code
* `Short Name` -> Short.Name
* `Table Name` -> Table.Name
* `Long Name` -> Long.Name
* `2-alpha code` -> ..2.alpha.code
* ...

Problem with `mutate()` input `National.accounts.reference.year`.
[34mi[39m NAs introduced by coercion
[34mi[39m Input `National.accounts.reference.year` is `as.numeric(National.accounts.reference.year)`.
